resources.string: A BMI of less than 18.5 indicates that you are underweight,so you may need to put on some weight. You are recommended to ask your doctor or a dietitian for advice
A BMI indicates that you are at a healthy weight for your height. By maintaining a healthy weight,you lower your risk of developing serious health problems.
A BMI of over 30 indicates that you are heavily overweight. Your health may be at risk if you do not lose weight. you are recommended to talk to your doctor or a dietitian for advice.
